body_html:
@tensorflowbutler So sorry for some information loss, the install environment is like below:
Ｕｂｕｎｔｕ 14.04 + tensorflow1.7 + cuda8.0 + cudnnv7 + TensorRT3.0.4 + bazel10 + py2 + 1080Ti

the build command is like this:
cd tensorflow-1.7.0
./configure at this step i have designated the CUDA CUDNN TRT path.
bazel build --config=cuda --config=monolithic //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so

Now i have build libtensorflow_cc.so success, and i run the cc example is also success!
Just as https://devblogs.nvidia.com/tensorrt-integration-speeds-tensorflow-inference/ , the TRT have integration into TF. So i think libtensorflow_cc.so should linked to the TRT library , and after i ldd this library the output is as below:

As you see above , we can see the cuda and cudnn library, however can not find TRT, and why?

Ｕｂｕｎｔｕ 14.04 + tensorflow1.7 + cuda8.0 + cudnnv7 + TensorRT3.0.4 + bazel10 + py2 + 1080Ti
the build command is like this:

Now i have build libtensorflow_cc.so success, and i run the  cc example is also success!
Just  as https://devblogs.nvidia.com/tensorrt-integration-speeds-tensorflow-inference/  , the TRT have integration into TF.   So i think libtensorflow_cc.so  should linked to the TRT library , and after i ldd this library the output is as below:

As you see above , we can see the cuda and cudnn library, however can not find TRT,  and why?
body:
@tensorflowbutler  So sorry for some information loss, the install environment is like below:
Ｕｂｕｎｔｕ 14.04 + tensorflow1.7 + cuda8.0 + cudnnv7 + TensorRT3.0.4 + bazel10 + py2 + 1080Ti

the build command is like this:
cd tensorflow-1.7.0
./configure   at this step i have  designated the CUDA CUDNN  TRT path.
bazel build --config=cuda --config=monolithic //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so

Now i have build libtensorflow_cc.so success, and i run the  cc example is also success! 
Just  as https://devblogs.nvidia.com/tensorrt-integration-speeds-tensorflow-inference/  , the TRT have integration into TF.   So i think libtensorflow_cc.so  should linked to the TRT library , and after i ldd this library the output is as below:
![default](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15881893/39658299-ab61ae48-5044-11e8-835a-4670887b7224.png)
As you see above , we can see the cuda and cudnn library, however can not find TRT,  and why?
